com.zebra.sdk.common.card.containers

Interface AlarmHandler


  • public interface AlarmHandler
    This interface is used to signal when an alarm condition has occurred.
    • Refer to ZebraCardErrors for list of error codes and descriptions

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AlarmEvent(AlarmInfo alarm)
      Invoked when an alarm condition is detected

    • Method Detail

      • AlarmEvent

        void AlarmEvent(AlarmInfo alarm)
        Invoked when an alarm condition is detected
        Parameters:
        alarm - a AlarmInfo instance containing information about the reported alarm condition.
